What is MQTC?
Are you an enterprise looking for a secure, reliable, and simple platform for universal messaging between systems, services and applications? Then, consider attending MQ Technical Conference(MQTC) which we believe to be the best platform for innovative and tailor-made sessions that promote your understanding of IBM MQ.
MQ Technical Conference is all set to kick off on September 26th-28th, 2016 at Kalahari Resorts in Sandusky, Ohio. And, being one of the Gold Sponsors for MQTC, We, Miracle Software Systems Inc., will await your handshake at our Booth #G5 with expert sessions and demos on MQ light On Prem/Cloud/Bluemix with Message Connect.

What We Are!!
Miracle Software Systems, Inc. is a Global Systems Integrator headquartered in Novi, Michigan. With over 20 years of experience and 2000 employees globally, it has been helping numerous Fortune 1000 customers achieve their business goals. Miracle's expertise spans across Application Development and Management, Cloud Infrastructure and Applications, Hybrid Integration, ERP Development and Support, and Information Management.
